title: Lunti
summary: ESG compliance tracker for construction teams with field-friendly checklists, offline capture, and automated reports.
highlights: Field-friendly ESG checklists with offline capture and sync
Compliance dashboards tailored for construction teams
Automated reports and PDFs for audits

title: BlockBayan
summary: Blockchain-backed donation ledger designed for transparent relief operations and tamper-evident receipts.
highlights: Transparent donation ledger with tamper-evident receipts
Blockchain-backed audit trails for relief operations
Real-time updates for donors and coordinators

title: QuestBoard
summary: Gamified project board that turns sprints into quests with XP, streaks, and team-visible momentum.
highlights: Turns sprint tasks into quests with XP and streaks
Live team momentum through real-time updates
Motivates shipping without breaking focus

title: Algohub
summary: Gamified way of learning data structures and algorithms. Earn achievements and enjoy algohub.
highlights: Gamified DSA practice with achievements
Focus on learning data structures and algorithms
Progression that rewards consistent study

title: TapCARE
summary: Emergency response app for a local high school requirement for capstone research.
highlights: Mobile emergency response built for a school rollout
Guides users to report incidents and get help fast
Created as a capstone research requirement

title: BatchMail
highlights: Automates bulk email sending flows
Template-based messages for quick outreach
Queues batches to send reliably

title: Connexa
summary: Event management and RSVP platform where users can use this in order to get updated with live events happening with organizations inside PUP.
highlights: Event hub for PUP orgs to publish updates
RSVP and announcements for live campus events
Keeps members informed on what is happening

title: ICPEP SE - PUP CRM Website
summary: A modern web application built with React and Vite that gets to know what ICPEP SE PUP Manila really is about.
highlights: Modern ICPEP SE PUP profile site on React/Vite
Showcases org information and activities
Built for fast, clean browsing

title: ICPEP SE - NCR Digital Passport
summary: A website built using Next.js that is for ICPEP.se NCR students that they can use in order to gain badges by attending live events and scanning their QR codes.
highlights: Digital passport for ICPEP.se NCR students
Badge collection by scanning event QR codes
Keeps event attendance history in one place

title: LogistIQ
summary: A full-stack web application built with Flask. Features user authentication, real-time updates, and responsive design.
highlights: Flask-based full-stack logistics dashboard
User authentication with real-time updates
Responsive UI for operations tracking

title: Pixie
summary: An AI interviewer for organizations in PUP where it can converse via voice chat and live follow up questions feedback.
highlights: AI interviewer that runs voice-based screenings
Live follow-up questions with immediate feedback
Designed for PUP org interview workflows

title: Static Mind
summary: A game made using Unity Engine and C#, you suddenly wake up in a dark room where you are suddenly being experimented on by Dr. Red. Find a way out before you lose your sanity.
highlights: Unity horror escape set in a lab
Find a way out before sanity drops
Story of experiments by Dr. Red

title: Shelldon
summary: A discord bot used in CyberPH PUP's discord server as well as CyberPH main discord server. Shelldon is a digital assistant for the server and manages announcements, members, and roles.
highlights: Discord bot assistant for CyberPH servers
Automates announcements and member management
Handles roles and server housekeeping
